meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>boat</radical> holds your <radical>weapon</radical> like a <radical>plate</radical>. So in a way, it's just a <kanji>tray</kanji> for your weapon.
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, this boat <kanji>tray</kanji> is so huge, it's gotten you <reading>ban</reading>ned (ばん) from the Small Boat Tray Association. Those pesky small boat tray enthusiasts...
